content.p: We are looking for students who have the potential and motivation to benefit from our courses, and who will make a valued contribution to the school, University and subject. The school offers a range of undergraduate, postgraduate taught and postgraduate research courses. Get information about our undergraduate courses in chemistry, learn about our bursaries and prizes, and read what current students say about us. Our BSc and MSci courses in Chemistry and Medicinal and Biological Chemistry are accredited by the Royal Society of Chemistry. We value diversity and are committed to equal opportunity. Get information about postgraduate courses in chemistry, funding opportunities, and research projects.
